Hi there! I am a Software Engineer at <a class="link" href="https://software.sil.org/" target="_blank">SIL Language Technology</a>. 

I recently graduated with a B.C.S. in Computer Science from <a class="link" href="https://calvin.edu/" target="_blank">Calvin University</a>, where I worked with <a class="link" href="https://kenarnold.org/" target="_blank">Ken Arnold</a> on intelligent and interactive writing tools.

My research interest is in human-computer interaction. I design, build, and study AI systems that think _with_ people rather than for them, augmenting human intelligence and creativity.

You can reach me at _myfirstname_\@jihokim.dev

### Updates

- **July 29, 2025:** I started working as a Software Engineer at <a class="link" href="https://software.sil.org/" target="_blank">SIL Language Technology</a>.

- **May 4, 2025:** I presented the posters of my two workshop papers at the In2Writing workshop at NAACL '25 in Albuquerque, NM.

- **November 2, 2024:** I was invited to give a talk about my undergraduate research at <a class="link" href="https://www.vai.org/event/2024-west-michigan-regional-undergraduate-science-research-conference/?tabUrl=tab-3">WMRUGS '24</a> in Grand Rapids, MI.
